sense.gloss: to lose hair, to become bald
to become bare (e.g. a mountain becomes bare of trees)

meanings: little girl employed at a brothel

sdata.j: あんまり↑心配↑↓しんぱい↓すると|↑禿↑↓は↓げる|よ。
sdata.e: Don't worry too much, or you'll go bald.

sdata.j: あんまり↑心配↑↓しんぱい↓すると|↑禿↑↓は↓げる|よ。
sdata.e: If you worry too much, you'll go bald.
